Description:
Grand Family Home In Convenient Location
Nestled on 707m2, this huge home has everything that a modern family requires. Perfectly positioned close to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, Waurn Ponds Train Station and the M1 taking you to Melbourne in under an hour, ensuring a convenient lifestyle for now and into the future.
This family home is comprised of four large bedrooms, master with huge walk in robe and stylish ensuite showcasing a spa bath and over size shower. The three remaining bedrooms have built in robes and share a central bathroom and separate toilet. The open plan kitchen, dining and living area is vast and is the perfect place to entertain friends and family. The kitchen features quality stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar and loads of storage and bench space as well as access to the undercover alfresco.
Adding to the endless options and flexible floor plan of this stunning home is a further two large living spaces and a well-proportioned study. Other notable features include central heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum and remote double lock up garage with secure internal access.
Outside you will find manicured and low maintenance gardens as well as a beautiful pool for all the family to enjoy. Don't miss your opportunity to inspect this magnificent family home.

Description:
Savvy Investment with a Long Term Lease!
For a private inspection on 2nd of May please contact myself.
Tucked away at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac, this free-standing villa is packed with potential and provides peace of mind to future investors with a lease in place until January 2021. Immaculately presented and yielding $310 per week, this is a lucrative opportunity not to be missed.
A full-width verandah creates a charming first impression of this low-set home, one of only two villas positioned on a level block. A spacious floorplan welcomes you inside and includes a separate lounge and an open plan living and dining room.
The functional kitchen features a full complement of inclusions such as a double pantry, gas cooking, tiled splashback and an eat-in breakfast bar. Glass sliders open onto the secluded courtyard where a sun-drenched deck is a perfect spot to fire up the barbeque for a casual Friday night dinner with friends.
Both bedrooms are generous in size and include a built-in robe. Servicing the bedrooms is a light and airy 2-way bathroom with a separate toilet.
Other quality attributes of this impeccable home include a single lock-up garage, internal laundry, split system air-conditioning and gas heater.
Future owners and tenants alike will also appreciate the ultra-convenient location, only a casual walk or quick drive to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre. Parks and playing fields surround the home providing plenty of green spaces to exercise in the great outdoors. Easily accessible to the Geelong Ring Road and the Surf Coast Highway, this central location is well serviced by public transport.
Astute buyers looking for a set and forget property with little ongoing maintenance must inspect! Call now to arrange your viewing today.
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Bright, Spacious Living in Sought After Location
Showcasing a recent sophisticated renovation throughout, you will fall in love with this home and the idyllic coastal lifestyle it provides. This spacious and light filled single level home is well positioned in a highly sought after quiet court location within the Sands Estate, only minutes from the beach.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- Master/parents' retreat is privately positioned away from all the living areas
- Detached pool house with heating/cooling making for an ideal studio/home office/kids retreat
- Wide frontage with side access double gates for boats/trailers/caravan
- High quality finishes throughout
- Brand new bathrooms and kitchen
- Family living room, ideal for 5th bedroom
- Open plan study and sitting room
- High ceilings maximising light and space
- Zoned ducted heating & A/C cooling
- In ground pool with self-cleaning and solar heating
- Low maintenance garden
- Covered deck with solar powered alfresco blinds
- Monitored security system - back to base & back to phone
- No back neighbours
What the VENDOR LOVES:
We love the variety of lifestyles our home now caters for after undertaking an extensive and carefully thought out renovation. Our home is move in ready!
We love our ENTIRE outdoor space where we can entertain, be active and spend time together year round in our very own secluded oasis.
We love the spacious layout of our home. We can be together as a family or retreat into our own private spaces with ease.
Residents have the added benefit of access to The Sands Health Club including 25m indoor pool, gym, cardio room, flood lit tennis courts.

Description:
Quality built home under 5 years old.
Less than 5 years old means this home has builders warranty and is eligible for $20,000 FHOG.
A beautifully built Porter Davis home stands elevated from the street and carries a unique blend of quality and affordability along with ultimate convenience in position. An easy commute is afforded with the train station and Ring Road close by, whilst the location is also minutes from everything including schools of all levels, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and a 15 minute drive delivering you to the Geelong CBD or Torquay.
Hidden behind an unassuming facade, the free flowing and functional floorplan boasts open spaces, multiple living zones, 4 carpeted bedrooms and a high quality fitout throughout. Upon entry the smart use of space is evident as the wide open hall leads the way through the home highlighted by neutral tones and timber flooring.
Positioned at the front the generous 4.5m x 4.5m master boasts plantation shutters, his and hers walk in robes and floor to ceiling tiled ensuite, including a double basin. 3 bedrooms each with built in robes are serviced by a central bathroom, separate powder room and laundry which includes substantial walk in linen and direct access into the workshop and garage.
The rear of the home hosts the activity epicentre as open plan living provides the chef of the family with full view of all living zones both indoor and outdoor. The kitchen is fully equipped to include 900mm cooking, dishwasher, stone tops with breakfast bar and also features a butlers pantry.
Adjoining the dining area, a rumpus room can be shut off for additional living space, theatre room, home office or guest bedroom.
The climate is controlled year round by gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
When entertaining family or guests this residence has the innate ability to transform itself into a grand entertainer as a pair of large stacking bifolds open from the living and dining out onto the 12m x 4m decking with underroof alfresco that invites the North and East sun.
Additionally, plenty of open grass space and smartly planted fruit trees create a rear yard seldom afforded in modern estate living. Everything about the landscape, front, back and side, is designed for minimal maintenance.
The decking also returns back down the side of the home and into the double garage and an additional workshop ideal for the home handyman or for additional storage of a trailer, motorbike or small car.
With everything a family home should be and in a location where everything is close by, this property may represent the end of your property search.
Call Dion Plumb on 0424 940 629 to learn more.

Description:
Flawless Combination of Luxury, Functionality and Convenience
Teeming with minimalist flair and sophistication, both inside and out, this David McDonald creation is the epitome of a contemporary luxury living. The beautifully executed interior features bold, clean lines and lofty light-filled spaces, all of which have been harmoniously combined with natural stone, swathes of timber and white panelled walls to achieve an ultra-luxe and modern home with strong congenial undertones.
Practicality and liveability wise, the design is outstanding. Divided over three levels, the ground floor includes a vast living space with an adjoining deck and a show-stopping timber-infused kitchen laden with Miele appliances. Theres also a large separate laundry with outdoor access. Central to the layout is a lift, which can be accessed from the generous garage. The second floor includes four generous bedrooms, central lounge space and three bathrooms, while the top floor houses a luxurious master suite with a private balcony.
To accurately gauge the quality and design finesse as well as the immense family-minded lifestyle potential on offer, a walk-through of this Barwon Heads beauty is a must. Within walking distance to Hitchcock Avenue, the river and Barwon Heads Golf Club, and only a three-minute drive to Thirteenth Beach, theres little left to be desired.
Five generous bedrooms, Including an impressive top-floor master suite with private balcony
Vast, light-filled living space with adjoining deck, gas log fireplace and stunning stone feature wall
Luxurious and contemporary timber-infused kitchen with Miele appliances and butlers pantry
Five contemporary bathrooms, central lift, generous laundry and spacious two-car garage with storage space and wine cellar
Outdoors entertainers deck with built-in barbeque plus a generous spa and outdoor shower
Within walking distance to Hitchcock Avenue, the local primary school, the river and The Barwon Heads Golf Club
Three-minute drive to Thirteenth Beach

Description:
Clinker Brick Beauty, Position Perfect
Desirably located in a highly sought after pocket of Belmont, this charming clinker brick home has responded exceptionally well to some modern updates and allows you to move in with absolute ease. You will find yourself only a short walk to the Highton Shopping Village, Barwon River and High Street shopping precinct, truly an unbeatable lifestyle.
The light filled kitchen is well positioned in the home, complete with ample cupboard and bench space, quality appliances plus a picturesque view. This flows through to the spacious formal lounge boasting a cosy open fireplace, adjacent to this is a study area. The true added bonus is the separate rumpus room behind the garage lending itself as the perfect kids/teenage retreat, studio or home office.
Outside you will embrace an expansive Merbau deck and pergola, perfect for soaking in the views and entertaining all year round. This steps down to the secure and spacious backyard for kids and pets.
Completing the home is three bedrooms complete with BIRs, the master bedroom features an impressive skylight with remote blind while the two bathrooms allow for functional daily living.
Features:
SLUG/workshop
Ducted heating
Evaporative cooling
Fireplace
Air Conditioner
Underhouse storage
Terms: 10% deposit, settlement 60/90 days.

Description:
When quality and convenience counts.
Ideal for those seeking a low maintenance carefree lifestyle within easy reach to a range of services. Light filled living is a hallmark of this "as new" residence where quality fixtures and fittings are a key feature.
This stunning family home consists of three bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe, central bathroom located for ease of day to day living for the remaining two bedrooms, study or potential fourth bedroom, formal lounge room, open plan kitchen with butler's pantry, dining and lounge room leading to alfresco entertaining area.
Features include double car remote garage with secure access and storage, stone bench tops throughout, gas cook top, electric oven, dishwasher, gas ducted heating, ducted evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, 9ft ceilings providing a great sense of space, video intercom, built in storage in garage, 600x600 polished porcelain tiles and fully landscaped private front and rear yard allowing you to just move in and enjoy from day one.
Within easy distance to Waurn Ponds Station, Waurn Ponds shopping, Aquatic Centre and the Ring Road. Major investment in the area including the ever expanding Deakin University, Epworth Hospital assures your investment for now and the future. Don't miss your opportunity, enquire today!

Description:
Townhouse living, upheld locale.
This new, low maintenance townhouse offers the ideal lifestyle for the everyday downsizer or investor. Just minutes from the Barrabool Hills Plaza and Highton Village, where you'll find inviting cafes and restaurants and all your daily amenities. Presenting a well-designed floor plan split over two levels, comprising of three spacious bedrooms, central bathroom and a generous kitchen, dining and living space.
Features - living space upstairs and downstairs, master upstairs with walk in robe and ensuite, guest room downstairs with walk in robe and ensuite, three bathrooms in total and three toilets.
Close proximity to Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, schooling of all ages, also the renowned Barwon River and its beautiful walking tracks. Your daily commute will be made seamless with easy access to the Geelong CBD, Ring Road and public transport. Don't miss your opportunity and organise your inspection today.
Insights: 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
817m2 With Stunning Views
Set on a large 817m2 (approx.) block with a stunning 180 degree views that capture the Barwon River, Geelongs CBD and the lights of GMHBA Stadium.
This well maintained cream brick veneer home is perfect for the astute buyer aiming to enter one of old Hightons finest streets. Set over two levels, consisting of 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, two living areas and huge backyard, ideal for an extension to the home with plenty of room to move.
With safe views, this home presents its self as a great opportunity.
Cara Road is beautiful established tree lined Street. Walking distance to the Barwon River, Highton shops and great Schools, this location is perfect for any buyer.
Combining a great solid home with beautiful views and plenty of space, this is an opportunity that should not be missed.
Insights: 21 Cara Road, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
OLD TORQUAY - LOW MAINTENANCE LIVING AT ITS BEST
This fantastic low maintenance and centrally located modern unit is perfect for the down-sizer, holiday maker or astute investor looking for long term growth in a popular location of Torquay. Conveniently positioned within a short stroll to the beach, shops, cafes, parks and public transport, this two-bedroom property offers privacy and open plan living at an affordable price. Upon entering you will find instant appeal with the high ceilings, neutral pallet and quality finish throughout. The kitchen/ meals and living area is spacious and provides plenty of natural light and leads you out to the north facing entertaining area. 2 generous sized bedrooms both with robes provide good accommodation and are serviced by a central bathroom plus second toilet. Add to this a European laundry, internal access to large single garage and features including split system heating/ cooling, stone bench-tops in kitchen and stainless-steel appliances making this the complete package for any astute buyer. For further information call us today.
*Please Note
Images are for marketing purposes and taken from the previous sale, the property is currently tenanted with different furniture and will be visibly different upon inspection.
Insights: 2/63 Cowrie Road, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 13 other 2 bedroom unit in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Titled Land Now Selling
The Dunes, Torquay has been designed to complement both the landscape and the laid back coastal lifestyle - while giving you state-of-the-art facilities and beautiful
scenery to build your new home.
Centrally located to let you make the most of Torquay's attractions The Dunes gives you quick and easy access to the beach and the Sands Golf Club, new shopping centres, schools, sporting facilities and just around the point leads you straight to Torquay's main beach.
Once you arrive home to The Dunes, the atmosphere, clean ocean air and open space will make it seem as if you are in a world of your own.
Insights: First listed on 25 September, this property has been on Domain for 25 days.

Description:
Where Comfort Meets Convenience
Perfect as a first home, downsizer or investment, this neatly presented two bedroom home is the very definition of low maintenance living. With a spacious interior and easy-care setting, you're only moments away from the High Street shops in Belmont, Highton Village or the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre. Nestled behind the picket fence, this beautiful home opens into a light-filled lounge and dining area that effortlessly flows through to a large kitchen and adjoining meals space. Built-in robes feature in both bedrooms, which share a well-appointed central bathroom with separate WC. There's also a sizeable laundry providing direct access to the courtyard, a lock-up garage, heating and split system air conditioning. Feature-packed for ease of living, this hidden gem further benefits from close proximity to Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and the Geelong ring road.
Insights: 23 Stephen Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 40 other 2 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Solid family home in a great location.
Set in a quiet street, in a sought-after Grovedale location, stands this solid, rendered brick home, comprising 3 generous sized bedrooms, central bathroom, an undercover entertaining area, and a large shed, this property is ideal for first homeowners, those with young families or even renovators.
This home has been well-maintained and renovated over the years, and still presents a great opportunity to add even more. The kitchen offers plenty of cupboard space, overlooks the backyard, and adjoins the dining area, which flows through to the light-filled front living room.
The large laundry has easy access to the low-maintenance back yard, which offers plenty of space for the kids to play, secure fencing for pets, a garden shed a double garage/workshop.
Three generous bedrooms, all with built-in robes are serviced by the central bathroom with separate toilet to the rear of the home.
Notable features include:
- Ducted gas heating throughout.
- Ducted evaporative cooling.
- 1.52kw solar panel PV system.
Located just a short walk to the local IGA, Grovedale West Primary School, Grovedale College, and either Coolabah Park or John Croft Reserve. Only a 3-minute drive to the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre and Geelong Ring Road, 15 minutes to the Geelong CBD, 15 minutes to the world-famous Surf Coast beaches and within highly sought-after school catchment zones, this property is perfect for young families.
Insights: 11 Portsmouth Crescent, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Engineering available including Soil and Survey Reports
*Soil and Land Survey report available upon request*
Residing only a few minutes from the gorgeous Barwon River and local walking tracks, this quality allotment of 762sqm approx. boasts the epitome of family lifestyle and easy access to all amenities. The desirable location is enhanced by the north facing aspect of the block allowing for picture-perfect sunsets over the Barrabool Hills every day of the week.
- Surrounded by quality homes
- Multiple Parks and reserves within walking distance
- Epworth Hospital and Deakin University five minutes away
- Waurn ponds Shopping Centre and Barrabool Hills Plaza five minutes away
- Quick access to the Geelong Ring Road for the Melbourne commute
- Five minutes to some of Geelong's greatest education

Description:
Large family living with views
Within walking distance of the Barwon River and its gorgeous walking tracks, North Valley Road shopping strip, schools, public transport along Mount Pleasant Road, the Highton Village and with easy access to the ring road. Positioned on the high side of Cara Road and residing on a 826sqm (approx.) allotment with tranquil views over Geelong and the Barwon River. The expansive open plan kitchen, living and dining space with air conditioner split system, offers the magnificent backdrop of views that this street is notorious for, easily accessible through direct access out to substantial front balcony. Consisting of four bedrooms, including a study or retreat upstairs, master with ensuite and large walk in robe. The front bedroom as you enter the property boasts its own ensuite and built in robes. A recently renovated kitchen equipped with an abundance of cupboard and bench space, separate living space which allows entry to the outdoor pool and entertaining alfresco area. Features include hardwood flooring throughout, two air conditioning split systems and ducted heating. An inspection is a must.
For more information on this property text '22 Cara' to 0428 444 841

Leafy Setting - Value Plus!
Ideal for those seeking a premium Highton position and exceptional value for money. Perfect for the convenience desiring first home buyer, those seeking to scale back in size or the savvy investor seeking exceptional growth.
This delightful light filled residence consists of two bedrooms, central bathroom, plus open plan updated kitchen, meals and lounge room. Includes lock up garage, sunny spacious courtyard and split system A/C.
Within easy distance to the Barwon River and walking tracks, public transport, Highton Village, Deakin University and the Ring Road.
Blue chip value buying at its best!

Description:
SPACIOUS, PRIVATE AND SERENE!!
Embraced by the best of what Jan Juc has on offer, this serene property situated in one of Jan Jucs most sort after addresses on an impressive fully fenced 4535sqm allotment (approx.) with subdivision potential (STCA), the nature lover and beach enthusiast alike, will warm to the natural coastal surrounds with easy access to the finest surf breaks the Surf Coast has to offer. The Western Red Cedar 4-bedroom residence rests peacefully within a pleasant garden setting of mature trees, positioned throughout to provide privacy and tranquillity.
The charming residence freshly painted throughout enjoys a north facing kitchen, open plan dining area, three light filled living areas two kept cosy with woodfire places, master bedroom with en-suite, spa bath and walk-in robe, 3 additional bedrooms with built in robes, renovated family bathroom, study with great in-roof storage, laundry and outdoor entertaining area, with a decked veranda and courtyard, shaded by large gum trees with views across a creative landscape out to the pool. Within easy walking distance of Jan Juc beach, Jan Juc village, kindergarten and recreational reserve, as well as relaxed access to walking tracks to Bells Beach and Torquay makes this property a priority for those looking for the supreme lifestyle proposition. Call today to book an inspection.
Insights: 145 Ocean Boulevard, Jan Juc VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 20 other 4 bedroom house in Jan Juc have recently been sold.

Description:
They Don't Make Backyards Like This Anymore
Easy family living is evident in this single level family home, a modern design and a neutral colour palette. One of the standout features of this home is the jumbo double garage complete with the ultimate workshop and storage space. In addition there are also side gates allowing secure parking for a small boat or trailer.
Enjoy long afternoons with family and friends in the state of the art alfresco area while the kids have a hit of cricket in the generously sized back yard of 629sqm.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- Two living areas
- Abundance of storage
- Timber floating floorboards
- Alfresco area with cafe blinds
- Substantial walk in pantry
- Stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances - 900mm oven and cook top
- Master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite
- Central heating and central cooling
- Double glazed windows
- Outdoor hot and cold shower
- Close proximity to The Quay Reserve, schools and The Dunes Shopping Village
What the VENDOR LOVES:
We love the location with the proximity to the beach, shops and sporting facilities. We absolutely love our outdoor entertaining space - watching the cricket or tennis on our outdoor TV on hot summer nights after a quick swim at the beach. And we just love all the storage spaces!! Chris loves his ultimate tradie garage the workshop, shelving and space to build!
Internal area
232.25m²

Description:
North reserve
We all know that the sun rises in the east and sets in the west. However, some don't know that the best orientation a home can be is North Back. Why, you ask? Well, the sun arches from the east to the west and in winter this happens in the north providing the warmth, light and comfort we all desire. https://www.domain.com.au/news/shine-a-light-on-the-best-aspect-20140306-348ok/
I point this out because you will be draped in northern light if you are the lucky buyer of this HUGE block in Seachange Estate.
Enjoy what most dream!

Description:
Salt Torquay
Salt Torquay breaks the mould. Nature inspired landscapes and innovative design. Enjoy the highest creature comforts while living in a truly green residential project. Ocean views. Sustainable. A home for life. Salt Torquay showcases everything we know about low carbon living and a connected community. The essence of Torquay lifestyle.
